item.title: Foo Fighters - All My Life
item.description:
All my life
I’ve been
Searching for
something
Something
never comes
Never leads
to nothing
Nothing satisfies
but I’m getting close
Closer to
the prize
At the end of
the rope
All night long
I dream of the day
When it comes around
and it’s taken away
Leaves me with
the feeling that
I feel the most
feel it come to life
When I see
your ghost

Calm down don’t
you resist
You’ve such a
delicate wrist
And if I give
it a twist
Something to hold
when I lose my grip
Will I find
something in there
To give me
just what I need
Another reason
to bleed
One by one
hidden up my sleeve
One by one
hidden up my sleeve
Yeah don’t let it
go to waste
I love it but
I hate the taste
Weight keep
pinning me down
Yeah don’t let it go
to waste
I love it but
I hate the taste
Weight keep
pinning me down

Will I find
a believer
Another one
who believes
Another one
to deceive
Over and over
down on my knees
If I get
any closer
